          Memory memory)

      • ConvertToPostfix

        public CmplxExpression ConvertToPostfix(java.lang.String input)
                                 throws ExpressionException,
                                        ConfigException
        Infix-to-postfix converter
        Parameters:
        input - The mathematica expression to convert
        Returns:
        A Stack containing the converted string
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - In case of bad input expression
        ConfigException - In case of misconfiguration of MathParser

      • ExecutePostfix

        public java.lang.Double ExecutePostfix(CmplxExpression input)
                                throws ExpressionException
        Executes an postfix-notation mathematical expression
        Parameters:
        input - The input stack containing the expression
        Returns:
        A number indicating the result of the expression
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - In case of bad input expression
